Reviews.Title: HAPPY WITH IT
Reviews.Author: BIG DOG
Reviews.Content: PRODUCT WORKED GREAT. JUST WHAT I NEED TO GET THE JOB DONE. WOULD BUY THIS PRODUCT ANYTIME AND WOULD TELL A FRIEND ABOUT.

ProductInfo.Features:
12V DC, 9 channel regulated power supply
Max output 5 Amp total
Max output 1Amp each channel
Individual LED power indication
Package includes: 1 of 9 ports 12V DC power box;  1 of key lock, 9 of power pigtail cables
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 9 Channel Port 12V DC Key Lock CCTV Security Camera Distributed Power Supply Box for Home Surveillance System with Lock and Power Pigtails M54
